M

main(String[]) - Static method in class view.MinesweeperLauncher
Launches the Minesweeper game.
markSpacesAdjacentToMines() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Iterates over each Space object in the minefield and calculates the number of mines that are adjacent to it.
MINE - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Relative path to image used for mines.
minefield - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
Two-dimensional grid of Space objects that represent each possible step in the minefield.
mineLocations - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
HashSet that stores the locations of each mine on the minefield using Point objects.
MinesweeperController - Class in controller
This class is designed to mediate any necessary interactions between the model and the view that cannot otherwise be handled by the Observer/Observable design pattern for the Minesweeper game.
MinesweeperController(MinesweeperModel) - Constructor for class controller.MinesweeperController
Creates a MinesweeperController object.
MinesweeperGUIView - Class in view
This file contains GUI component of the application for Minesweeper.
MinesweeperGUIView() - Constructor for class view.MinesweeperGUIView
 
MinesweeperLauncher - Class in view
This class serves as the main class for the Minesweeper game.
MinesweeperLauncher() - Constructor for class view.MinesweeperLauncher
 
MinesweeperModel - Class in model
This class stores and maintains the game state for a Minesweeper game.
MinesweeperModel() - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
Creates a MinesweeperModel object and initializes it to a default state by calling helper function to set all fields to the beginning value.
MinesweeperModel(int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
This constructor is called when the user input a specific board size and a valid number of mine
MinesweeperModel(String) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
Creates a MinesweeperModel object by loading data from the input file.
MinesweeperTests - Class in utilities
JUnit Testing class that includes test cases for the testable components of the Minesweeper controller, model, utility classes.
